Karla:
Serban is a nickname that came to me the Queen of Serenia.
The day we arrived in this cruel world, we were attacked by monsters, and there was no number. Brave Queen fought along with all. She tried to cry out to Sayhe to protect us, but spent all his strength. Monster Marshal took advantage of her weakness, and... I had covered the Queen, having assumed its final blow. In appreciation of Serenia gave me a second name. In the ancient language "Serban" means "Great Hero"...
But this title is followed to another.
